thread.title: PAS leader: Indeed, children are at Act 355 rally
thread.title_full: PAS leader: Indeed, children are at Act 355 rally

title: PAS leader: Indeed, children are at Act 355 rally
text:
More 
Children, including those from religious schools, are at PAS' rally to support amendments to the Syariah Courts (Criminal Jurisdiction) Act 1965. 
In a post on Facebook yesterday, Pahang PAS head Rosli Abdul Jabar said their participation will teach them to love their religion. 
For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
